endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Seed for random number generator. If None or -1, a random seed will be used.

parameters.description: Seed for random number generator. If None or -1, a random seed will be used.

parameters.name: top_k

param_schema.title: Top K
param_schema.description: Reduces sampling to the k most likely tokens.

parameters.description: Reduces sampling to the k most likely tokens.

parameters.name: top_p

param_schema.title: Top P
param_schema.description: Reduces sampling to tokens with cumulative probability of p. When set to  `0` (default), top_k sampling is used.

parameters.description: Reduces sampling to tokens with cumulative probability of p. When set to  `0` (default), top_k sampling is used.

parameters.name: prompt

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.description: A description of the music you want to generate.

parameters.description: A description of the music you want to generate.

parameters.name: duration

param_schema.title: Duration
param_schema.description: Duration of the generated audio in seconds.

parameters.description: Duration of the generated audio in seconds.

parameters.name: input_audio

param_schema.title: Input Audio
param_schema.description: An audio file that will influence the generated music. If `continuation` is `True`, the generated music will be a continuation of the audio file. Otherwise, the generated music will mimic the audio file's melody.

parameters.description: An audio file that will influence the generated music. If `continuation` is `True`, the generated music will be a continuation of the audio file. Otherwise, the generated music will mimic the audio file's melody.

parameters.name: temperature

param_schema.title: Temperature
param_schema.description: Controls the 'conservativeness' of the sampling process. Higher temperature means more diversity.

parameters.description: Controls the 'conservativeness' of the sampling process. Higher temperature means more diversity.

parameters.name: continuation

param_schema.title: Continuation
param_schema.description: If `True`, generated music will continue from `input_audio`. Otherwise, generated music will mimic `input_audio`'s melody.

parameters.description: If `True`, generated music will continue from `input_audio`. Otherwise, generated music will mimic `input_audio`'s melody.

parameters.name: continuation_end

param_schema.title: Continuation End
param_schema.description: End time of the audio file to use for continuation. If -1 or None, will default to the end of the audio clip.

parameters.description: End time of the audio file to use for continuation. If -1 or None, will default to the end of the audio clip.

parameters.name: continuation_start

param_schema.title: Continuation Start
param_schema.description: Start time of the audio file to use for continuation.

parameters.description: Start time of the audio file to use for continuation.

parameters.name: multi_band_diffusion

param_schema.title: Multi Band Diffusion
param_schema.description: If `True`, the EnCodec tokens will be decoded with MultiBand Diffusion. Only works with non-stereo models.

parameters.description: If `True`, the EnCodec tokens will be decoded with MultiBand Diffusion. Only works with non-stereo models.

parameters.name: classifier_free_guidance

param_schema.title: Classifier Free Guidance
param_schema.description: Increases the influence of inputs on the output. Higher values produce lower-varience outputs that adhere more closely to inputs.

parameters.description: Increases the influence of inputs on the output. Higher values produce lower-varience outputs that adhere more closely to inputs.
